mapper.update: update train set train_name = #{trainName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, train_time = #{trainTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, train_room = #{trainRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fabu_time = #{fabuTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, train_explain = #{trainExplain,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where train_id = #{trainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select train_id, train_name, train_time, train_room, fabu_time, train_explain from train
SELECT train_id FROM eaas.train where train_id = (select max(train_id) from eaas.train)
